Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bowl
Description: Large black and red bowl with a slightly restricted mouth, simple lip and flattened convex bottom. The interior, which is black, has been carefully polished horizontally. The exterior bears a red slip except on the lip, which is black, and has been burnished, creating in some areas a rippled effect (hence "rippled ware").
